author: Monica Alba
title: New Trump campaign ad compares Sanders to Biden after Sanders ends 2020 bid
description: Less than two hours after Sen. Bernie Sanders announced he was suspending his presidential campaign, President Trump's campaign debuted a digital ad closely comparing him to Joe Biden.
content:
WASHINGTON Less than two hours after Sen. Bernie Sanders announced he was suspending his presidential campaign, President Trump's campaign debuted a digital ad closely comparing him to Joe Biden, the now-apparent Democratic nominee.
The new online spot ties … [+29014 chars]
